name: Novalang
snippet: A next-gen platform that simulates social situations through the usage of a large language model (LLM) trained on famous texts, designed to help kids improve writing and communication skills by using works of famous authors.

name: Colors
snippet: A switch drawing game that helps those with mobile disabilities draw using

name: TJ ATC
snippet: A webpage that acts as a database for games to practice NuVoice, a vocabulary builder tool that allows you to create, modify, and save vocabularies. Currently in development!
